@Caenorst @jart

That's incorrect. Non-fused batch normalization is dramatically slower than the fused version when using NCHW – in fact, when using non-fused BN, NCHW is slower than NHWC, despite all the convolutions going faster: #7551 (comment)

Non-fused batch norm currently slows things down so much in NCHW that it's unusable in that mode, and this is actually a pretty significant performance landmine.
